original_text: Bezalel made the yard around the tent. The south side of the yard was 45 metres long. It had curtains that were made from good linen.
korean_text: 그가 또 뜰을 만들었으니 남으로 뜰의 남쪽에는 세마포 포장이 백 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: Bezalel made the yard around the tent.
The south side of the yard was 45 metres long.
It had curtains that were made from good linen.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 좋은 아마 포로 만들어진 휘장이 있었습니다.
